10 CLS:RESTORE:INPUT A:IF A=1 THEN 50
20 FOR T=1 TO A-1
30 READ I,J:IF J=0 THEN 40
35 GOTO 30
40 NEXT
50 GOSUB 11710
60 GOTO 10
11500 REM DATA
11510 DATA 95,180,129,60,113,60,129,120,142,60,155,60,129,255,129,60,113,60,87,120,95,60,103,60,113,120,103,60,95,255,0,0
11530 DATA 95,16,87,4,129,4,95,4,77,4,129,4,95,16,0,0
11540 DATA 103,120,142,60,103,255,1,120,129,120,142,60,129,120,113,60,142,120,171,255,225,255,0,0
11550 DATA 155,180,155,120,155,60,142,120,155,60,171,120,193,60,155,255,0,0
11560 DATA 1,160,129,255,155,40,171,80,193,40,227,255,1,40,1,160,193,255,193,40,171,80,155,40,129,255,0,0
11700 REM MUSIC
11710 READ I,J:IF J=0 THEN RETURN 
11720 GOSUB11740:GOTO 11710
11740 SOUNDI,INT(J/40)+1:RETURN
